LanguageData.kunai_ao.label: ThrowingKunai
LanguageData.Kunai_Ranged.label: ThrowingKunai
LanguageData.Kunai_Ranged.description: Throwing Kunai liked survival knife. When you equipped it you feel like a ninja and you can run fast. This Kunai is for throwing and can not attack melee.
LanguageData.kunai_3ao.label: ThrowingKunai(three-times)
LanguageData.Kunai_3Ranged.label: ThrowingKunai(three-times)
LanguageData.Kunai_3Ranged.description: Throwing Kunai liked survival knife. Throw three at the same time. This Kunai has no effect to speed up your feet.
LanguageData.Bullet_Tanegasima.label: TanegasimaBullet
LanguageData.Gun_Tanegasima.label: TanegasimaGun
LanguageData.Gun_Tanegasima.description: Arquebus gun made by improving Musket gun. The size of the caliber and the weight of the bullet are distinctive, and it has the power to blow off part of the body in the case of short range shooting. However, it is necessary to always carry around the arquebus rope and the fire rock, so the moving speed drops.
LanguageData.Arrow_JPstyleGreatBow.label: arrow
LanguageData.Bow_JPstyleGreat.label: JapaneseBow
LanguageData.Bow_JPstyleGreat.description: A bow that improved the Great Bow and raised its power and range.
